00043   ${"$key"}=$element;

00047 $amount=0.0;
00048 for ($i=0;$i<$nb_item;$i++) {
00049   // store quantity & goods in array
00050   $a_good[$i]=${"e_march$i"};
00051   $a_quant[$i]=${"e_quant$i"};
00052   $a_vat[$i]=${"e_march$i"."_tva_id"};
00053  if ( isNumber(${"e_march$i"."_sell"}) == 0 ) {
00054       // If the price is not set we have to find it from the database
00055       $a_price[$i]=GetFicheAttribut($p_cn,$a_good[$i],ATTR_DEF_PRIX_VENTE);
00056     } else {
00057       // The price is valid
00058       $a_price[$i]=${"e_march$i"."_sell"};
00059  }
00060 
00061   $a_amount[$i]=$a_price[$i]*$a_quant[$i];
00062   $amount+=$a_amount[$i];
00063   $tva=GetTvaRate($cn,GetFicheAttribut($cn,$a_good[$i],ATTR_DEF_TVA));
00064   // Prepare the array to print
00065   $a_good_detail[]=array('id'=>$i+1,
00066                          'name'=>GetFicheAttribut($cn,$a_good[$i],ATTR_DEF_NAME),
00067                          'quantity'=>$a_quant[$i],
00068                          'Unit'        =>$a_price[$i],
00069                          'Total HTVA' => $a_amount[$i],
00070                          'tva'=>$tva['tva_label'],
00071                          'Total' => $a_amount[$i]+$a_amount[$i]*$a_quant[$i]*$tva['tva_rate']);
00072 }
00073 
00074 $a_vat=ComputeVat($cn,  $a_good,$a_quant,$a_price,$a_vat);
00075 $sum_vat=0.0;
00076 foreach ( $a_vat as $element => $t) {
00077   echo_debug('print_invoice.php',__LINE__," a_vat element $element t $t");
00078   $sum_vat+=$t;
00079   echo_debug('print_invoice.php',__LINE__,"sum_vat = $sum_vat");
00080 }

00082 $ret="";

00085 $pdf->ezSetCmMargins(2,2,2,2);

00088

00121 }
00122 $total=$amount+$sum_vat;

00126               array('width'=>200,'showHeadings'=>0,'shaded'=>0,'cols'=>array('amount'=>array('justification'=>'right'))));
